subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Nieuwenhuis, who was traded to the Angels and reacquired less than a month later so he could be stashed in the minors, became the first Met to hit three home runs in a home game.
snippet: Nieuwenhuis, who was traded to the Angels and reacquired less than a month later so he could be stashed in the minors, became the first Met to hit three home runs in a home game.
